text: Jaanong, Modimo o neetse Aberahame le Ngwana wa one ditsholofetso dingwe. Mme lemogang gore ga gotwe ditsholofetso di ne di neetswe bana ba gagwe, jaaka go ne go katwe, di tshwanetse bomorwae botlhe, ebong Bajuta botlhe ba go neng go buiwa kaga bone, mme tota go ne go buiwa kaga Morwawe ebong Keresete.
